text: 11:5 Ofa Gami 10:2; 2 Samuel 22:9; 2 Atriviba 1:10-12; Onger Akaba 97:3; Jeremaia 5:14; Hosea 6:5Eghtɨ gumazitam arazir kurabar aning damusɨ damutɨ, avim aningɨn akamningɨn otogh, bar aningɨn apanibar isigh me gasɨghasigham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir manam arazir kuramɨn aning damusɨ, an ovegham.
